# Linear Regression

This chapter introduces the concepts of ordinary least squares.

## Model
The linear model is:  \( y = X\beta + \varepsilon \)

## Assumptions
- Linearity  
- Independence  
- Homoscedasticity  
- Normality  

## Example
```{r}
#| echo: true
x <- 1:10
y <- 2 + 3*x + rnorm(10)
lm(y ~ x)
